issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I change user on mac, and now I just this problem.
I canâ€™t compile for permission.
I try reinstall Axway Appcelerator Studio on new user but nothing.

That works.
fields.summary: Changing user on MacOS blocks compilation

comments.body: Hello, Can you please share "appc ti setup check" log in here? thanks.

Hi [~gtassistro].

From the logs it looks like the user you're using doesn't have permission to write files in the directory. Was the project initially created by the other user? Can you go into finder and give your MacOS user admin permission to the workspace directory and try again?

[~gtassistro],
We haven't heard back from you since our last response. I thought Iâ€™d check in to see how things are progressing with your need?Â 

Please let us know if the problem persists.Â
Hello, Make sure the user has had permission to write files in the directory. If the user doesn't have permission, then he will not be able to compile. Thanks.
